page.title: 08Community Centre, Bur. Hill
page.content: It has been proposed to make the barn next to Birchwood Grove School into the{Folders Lane Community Centre.} Some people in the area are against the idea. They say that more cars will make roads dangerous and could block them. After discos, drunken teenagers could disturb the peace. The school might suffer as well as local residents. It could be damaged after children and teachers had gone home. Other people say that the area desperately needs a centre for meetings and leisure activities. A Community Centre might also keep young people off the streets and help police in the fight against vandalism. In a recent vote,{the Folders Lane {Residents' Association's application {for planning permission was rejected {by one vote.}However, they plan to appeal against the decision.
